message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $18,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. I hope this revised offer works for you.

Bob, I understand your position. While I value our potential partnership, I can't go lower than $16,500. This price reflects the true worth of the product, and I believe it's still a good deal for you. Let's find a middle ground!

Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering the value of the product, I am comfortable offering $16,000. I believe this price respects the product's worth while also allowing me to stay within my budget.
